definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: Pressure gauge shall be calibrated before test and witness of owner.
sentences.chinese: 试验用的压力表，试验前应在船东的监督下校验。

sentences.english: Assign 2 hours to shipowner to control the vessel when on trial.
sentences.chinese: 在试航过程中，须分配两小时给船东作自作操控。

sentences.english: Have a good relation with ship-owners and most advantage price of shipping.
sentences.chinese: 与各船东良好的合作关系及极具优势海运价格。

sentences.english: I hope a competent second officer will be chosen by ship-owner.
sentences.chinese: 我希望船东能选一个合格的二副。

sentences.english: All sharp edges to be ground to Owner's and paint manufacture's satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 所有的锐边打磨至船东和油漆商满意为止。

sentences.english: 'Charterers were trying to use the media to make a bigger impact, ' Mr. Zhang told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 张良对记者说，船东试图利用媒体造成更大的影响。

sentences.english: The ship-owner has issued a clean on board bill of lading.
sentences.chinese: 船东已签发了清洁装运提单。

sentences.english: The shipowner has still held a merchant fleet of seven cargo-vessels.
sentences.chinese: 这个船东仍拥有一支7艘货船的商船队。

sentences.english: The extra payment incurred can be debited to the shipowner's account.
sentences.chinese: 由此产生的额外费用记入船东的账上。

sentences.english: All bunkers used by the Vessel while off hire shall be the Owners' account.
sentences.chinese: 停租期间船舶所使用的燃油由船东承担费用。

sentences.english: Large amount of disputes occurs spontaneously between shipowner and charterer on this case.
sentences.chinese: 船东和租船人围绕这个内容产生的纠纷为数不少。

sentences.english: Details of painting scheme and procedures to be submitted and shall be approved by Owners.
sentences.chinese: 油漆安排和程序的详细文件应该递交船东经船东批准。

sentences.english: I am waiting for further instruction from ship-owner.
sentences.chinese: 我正等待船东的进一步指示。

sentences.english: It has no more difficulty to identify the contract when the ship-owner signed his B/L.
sentences.chinese: 当船东签发自己的提单时，合同认定没有太多困难。

sentences.english: A body corporate shall be registered as owner by its corporate name.
sentences.chinese: 法人团体须以其法团的名义注册为船东。

sentences.english: Owners commenced arbitration proceedings asserting that Charterers were not entitled to make the deduction.
sentences.chinese: 船东提起仲裁，认为承租人没有权利扣除运费。

definition: tugboat/boat towed by a tugboat/to tow a boat
